author: Ted
content:
Okay... what did you do with all the color? You didn't just toss it in the garbage? Oh no! Didn't your mother ever tell you about the color starved children in.. poor places? How could you do that just to produce this... this... well, okay it is magnificent. Majestic... like that.

But still, I wonder about those poor orphaned colors and how their pining away somewhere. Feeling unloved by their creator. It's... so... so... colorless. ðŸ™‚
